title: Mother and daughters told 'too big' for business class
description: Three woman are fighting for refunds after Thai Airways forced them to sit in economy seats.

title: Was this Trump's best week yet?
description: From the Iowa caucus mishap to his acquittal in the Senate, this week has treated the US president well.

title: Saracens fined for fielding ineligible player but keep Champions Cup place
description: Saracens will stay in the Heineken Champions Cup after being fined 50,000 euros instead of a points deduction for fielding an ineligible player.

title: GB trail Slovakia 2-0 in Fed Cup tie after Dart loses thriller
description: Great Britain trail Slovakia 2-0 in their Fed Cup qualifier as a battling Harriet Dart loses in three sets to Viktoria Kuzmova.

title: Phillip Schofield announcement: How it feels when your partner comes out as gay
description: "You doubt everything you've ever believed in your life," says one woman, who still lives with her husband.

title: Ex-Pakistan international Jamshed jailed over spot-fixing
description: Nasir Jamshed and his co-defendants "undermined public confidence" in the sport, a judge says

title: Brexit: What trade deals has the UK done so far?
description: Securing a UK-EU trade deal will be top a priority over the months ahead.

title: Spend a penny? Bridgend public toilets sell for £61k
description: The Victorian toilets are the latest former public conveniences in Wales to go under the hammer.

title: 'My newborn son gave another baby life'
description: Valentina Daprile lost her son when he was eight days old. She and her husband donated his organs so another child could live.
